content:
TITLE: Initializing Tabulator with JavaScript DESCRIPTION: JavaScript code to initialize a Tabulator instance by selecting the container element and creating a new Tabulator object. This transforms the empty div into an interactive table. SOURCE: https://github.com/olifolkerd/tabulator/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` var table = new Tabulator("#example-table", {}); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Including Tabulator Library and CSS DESCRIPTION: Basic HTML code to include the Tabulator library and its CSS stylesheet in your project. This is the first step in setting up Tabulator. SOURCE: https://github.com/olifolkerd/tabulator/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating HTML Container for Tabulator DESCRIPTION: HTML code to create a div element that will hold the Tabulator table. This element will be referenced in JavaScript to initialize the table. SOURCE: https://github.com/olifolkerd/tabulator/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ```
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Including Tabulator via CDN DESCRIPTION: HTML code to include Tabulator's CSS and JavaScript files from the UNPKG CDN servers, eliminating the need for local installation. SOURCE: https://github.com/olifolkerd/tabulator/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Tabulator via NPM DESCRIPTION: Command to install Tabulator using the NPM package manager. This adds Tabulator to your project dependencies in package.json. SOURCE: https://github.com/olifolkerd/tabulator/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm install tabulator-tables --save ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Tabulator via Bower DESCRIPTION: Command to install Tabulator using the Bower package manager. This adds Tabulator to your project dependencies in bower.json. SOURCE: https://github.com/olifolkerd/tabulator/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` bower install tabulator --save ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running Tabulator Tests DESCRIPTION: Bash commands for running Tabulator's unit and end-to-end (E2E) tests. Shows how to run tests individually or all tests at once using npm scripts. SOURCE: https://github.com/olifolkerd/tabulator/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` # Unit test npm run test:unit # E2E test npm run build # Make sure to build the project first npx playwright test # Run the tests # or npm run test:e2e # Run all tests npm run test ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Code of Conduct Links in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Markdown link definitions for the Contributor Covenant homepage and version references. SOURCE: https://github.com/olifolkerd/tabulator/blob/master/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` [homepage]: http://contributor-covenant.org [version]: http://contributor-covenant.org/version/1/4/ ```
